title: The Promise
description: Young architect Michael Hillyard and artist NancyMcAllister are determined to get married despitehis wealthy mother's disapproval. Then, minutesbefore their wedding, a terrifying accident and acruel deception separate Michael and Nancy --perhaps forever. Each pursues a new life -- Nancy inCalifornia, Michael in New York. But eventuallynothing -- and no one -- can keep them apart asthey keep their vow never to say good-bye."
author: Danielle Steel
